abstract: A new at-home hair and makeup service serves polished and professional results.
snippet: A new at-home hair and makeup service serves polished and professional results.
lead_paragraph: An unlikely beauty director at best, I'm the girl who - horrors - doesn't take off her mascara at night (if I'm even wearing any) and never mastered the fine art of foundation. I do have a couple of guilty pleasures, like an occasional cat eye or a sweep of blue eye shadow, but my application skills are next to nil. What's more, I barely know how to wield a hair dryer or flat iron. If I don't have time to run to Orlo or Garren, I'm sunk.
